name: Noah Hilliard
text: This place is awesome! Used to work here as a delivery driver and it was the most fun I had in senior year of high school. Everything on the menu is great from the pizza and subs to the wings and salad. Patrick and Chrissy are great owners and run a great franchise.

name: Janelle C. Bawayan
text:
Okay, I'm visiting from NYC and was in the area craving some pizza. Marco's Pizza caught my eye and just off the bat we're welcomed in the door!
The staff is nice and focused and attentive! ‚Ä¶More

text: Marco's thin and crispy is about as good as it gets when it comes to pizza.

text: The gluten friendly pineapple and ham pizza was delicious! we definitely recommend it

text:

text: Let me preface by saying, I am not a pizza guy. I tolerate the stuff, but usually prefer burgers, burritos, asian etc. But this place, this freaking place. It's an awesome pizza joint. Try the old world pepperoni and you may never go back ‚Ä¶More

text: What a great experience at Marco's . Met the owner and he was super nice. Found out they sell gluten free pizza, what a great pizza. I highly recommend Marco's to everyone

name: Kat
text: My husband and I had Marco's pizza catered for a party yesterday and the staff set up the food beautifully and were so sweet. We always recommend Marco's pizza!

name: Carol Mularski
text: We tried the Gluten-Free pizza and it was amazing.  The salads are very fresh with awesome croutons.  It‚Äôs a very clean restaurant with very friendly service.  A definite recommend. üëçüèª

text: Amazing service On the phone both times we have ordered.  SUPER fast delivery the first time and we opted for pickup due to their honesty about delivery time.  Pizza and cheezy bread were ON POINT, fresh, hot, and delish!  Met the owner ‚Ä¶More

Honestly it's 5 stars except for tonight.

text: Excellent pizza - great customer service. I have used carry-out as well as delivery. The staff are always friendly and professional. They show you the pizza before you leave which is smart but also shows they want to make it right.,each ‚Ä¶More

text: We love Marco‚Äôs pizza! Every time we order pizza Marco‚Äôs is our go to place. Wonderful staff!

text: They do not sell pizza by the slice! Very disappointed.

name: R Fisher
text: Dropped in on a whim and so glad we did!! Great pizza (free flavored crust). Fresh, hot & tasty! Friendly staff who went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of. We would definitely come again and recommend to others!

name: Rich B
text: Not impressed at all. The sauce on a regular cheese pizza tastes like middle school lunch but worse. The garlic bread is not good at all. Poor flavor and seasoning. Not sure if they need better ingredients or cooks or both? ‚Ä¶More

name: M
text: So Very Tasty !  Thank you  So Much for the delivery.

text: Ordered an XL Pepperoni and a order of cheesy bread with my coworkers at Great Clips, absolutely wonderful. text: We tried the thin crust and original crust, buffalo wings, and cinnamon squares.  The original crust is to doughy thin crust had a nice texture. Wings were very good, cinnamon squares were nothing special. What kills this place is the ‚Ä¶More

name: Poooh Bearr
text: Lovely little pizza shop! You can see care goes into the food making process and feel how sincere the owners and employees are.. It‚Äôs refreshing to find somewhere that has a warm, bubbly, and honest-to-goodness inclination in the working environment and general atmosphere, and you'll find that here!

text: Very good Pizza.  We usually like thinner pies but their regular crust is very good and fluffy.  Def worth a try and they are open on Sunday

text: In my tastes better than Domino's I like a good pizza and they make a good one

name: zak thomas
text: This was a gift to Palm City, really. I lived in Ohio where Marcos are everywhere and this is so so much better than it is there. The crust is one of the best crusts on a pizza I've had from a call in pizza restaurant. GO THERE you'll love it.

name: MJ Silva
text: Best pizza! So fast and fresh and delicious. My kids (and I) love it. Amazing staff, overall very nice!!

name: Sara Peterson
text: Tried Marco's cheesey bread for the first time and it was excellent! Patrick and his staff were extremely friendly and very excited about the future of their new location. I will for sure be going back to Marco's pizza and telling everyone about my great experience. Keep up the good work!

name: Buck Lopez
text: Fast fresh delicious extra delicious

name: james tomerlin
text: Good pizza, decent pricing and great delivery.

name: Maximillian Ramirez
text: Everyone is so friendly! From pizza artists to managers. My pizza tasted fresh as if I went and made my own pie! Also, it‚Äôs helpful that the location is easily accessible.

name: Cindy White
text: Our 1st time ordering from marco's pizza and we have found our new go to pizza place. The toppings were generous and the flavor was amazing.

name: Melanie McConnell
text: Actually it's one of the better places in town to get pizza they make a really wonderful Pizza Delicious very good just perfect just right for somebody that is picky as I am.

name: Angela Jones-Neece
text: My Husband picked up pizza for us Friday night from Marco's, and we LOVED it!!! So delicious!!!! We tried an original crust Deluxe pizza, and a thick crust Pepperoni pizza. We prefer the original crust over the thick, but we will be trying the thin crust pizza too!

name: Sharyn Garcia
text: We just ate at the newly opened Marco's in Palm City and it was amazing. Great food and friendly, fast service! The owners, Patrick and his wife will have a lot of success with the quality of their food and service!

name: Michelle Walker
text: Great deals. Great pizza.

name: Avianna Walden
text: Great prices , awesome pizza !!! Satisfaction 100%. I walked in not expecting much but I was proven wrong!! The food is great, customer service is a plus. You must come!!!!

name: Gabriella Johnson
text: Marcos is my favorite pizza hands down and out of all the Marco‚Äôs  I have been to this is my favorite one because our pizza was so fresh and the customer service was awesome! Great job guys! I already sent three people there! And I will be ordering there again!
